mapper.insert: insert into commodity (commodity_id, commodity_name, commodity_code, commodity_type, storage_id, status, is_hot, price, discount, discount_price, manager, up_time, sell_time, down_time) values (#{commodityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isHot,jdbcType=BIT}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{discountPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{manager,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sellTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{downTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
